If Player A passes the pot to Player B, Player B can either take 3 coins and pass the pot back to Player A or take 1 coin and continue. If at any point Player A takes the pot, the game ends. If the game proceeds to the 8th round, the pot is split evenly between the players. What is the optimal strategy for each player and what is the expected outcome of the game?
